mapper.insert: insert into review values( review_seq.nextval, #{review_writer}, #{review_hotel}, #{review_reserve}, #{review_score}, #{review_content}, sysdate, '등록')
mapper.select: select H.hotel_name, R.room_name, RV.reserve_in, RV.reserve_out, RW.review_score, RW.review_content, RW.review_when, RW.review_no from hotel H inner join room R on R.hotel_no = H.hotel_no inner join reserve RV on RV.reserve_room_no = R.room_no inner join review RW on RW.review_reserve = RV.reserve_no where RW.review_state = '등록' order by review_no desc
mapper.update: update review set review_state = '삭제' where review_no = #{review_no}
mapper.select: select round(avg(review_score),1) from review where review_hotel = #{hotel_no}

select r1.review_score, r1.review_content, r1.review_when, r3.room_name from review R1 inner join reserve R2 on r1.review_reserve = R2.reserve_no inner join Room R3 on r2.reserve_room_no = r3.room_no where r1.review_hotel = #{hotel_no} and r1.review_state ='등록' order by r1.review_no desc
